meanings.definition: Not able to be obtained or used
meanings.sent1: The toy was unavailable at the store.
meanings.sent2: The library book was unavailable for borrowing.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream truck was unavailable, so we had to settle for popsicles.
meanings.sent4: Her attention was like an unavailable prize, always just out of reach.
meanings.sent5: The secret recipe remained unavailable to all but the chef.

meanings.sent1: The remote village was unavailable by road.
meanings.sent2: The top shelf was unavailable without a ladder.
meanings.sent3: The last cookie in the jar seemed to play a game of unavailable hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His dreams felt as unreachable and unavailable as the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest lay at the bottom of the ocean, forever unavailable to divers.
